author: Colin Travis
comment: Great watchfaces, clean animations, cool functionality, but with many UsTwo faces, you can't show the date, which is such an easy fix.

author: Thomas Parker
comment: Great app, very useful. Will you be updating to the 2.0 complications?

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Thomas!

While we're not actively working on our Timer faces, I've logged your feedback. Thanks again!

comment: Complications and hour ticks in ambient would be nice. Great timer app though!

author: anant kandpal
comment: First time a developer did something amazing for the android wear ecosystem

author: Siddhartha Barot
comment: Like this watch.

author: Mhafiz Mk
comment: The best clock with counting minutes

author: HECTOR REYES
comment: VERY NICE!

author: Sheldon Xu
comment: Very useful interface. Is there a way to set the timer by hand position? (Its 5:06 right now. I want to tap at the :10 to have it ring in 4 mins). Also I keep setting the timer accidentally multiple times throughout the day. Not sure how it happens. Maybe a double tap to set timer would help? Thanks!
title: Classy

author: Tellis Varda
comment: can I donate? im Adhd and this has changed my life!!  ______________                     UPDATE!!!!!: seriously, yall need to shut up and take my money. i feel bad not paying for this. it really has changed the entire way I go about my day. Sometimes I go to make a reminder and will blank at the OK google screen. This lets me set a "reminder" instantly without having to think. That, and I set so many timers throughout the day this really speeds it up.
title: where the HELL

author: Udit Ghai
comment: Cronos looks awesome and is quite handy. however there are times when the timer starts automatically or gets cancelled due to unintentional touch on the watchface. 2 touch to start or cancel as additional settings might be extra helpful. don't use any other watchface that comes bundled
title: Great Utility and Chronos

author: Patrick Vuillermin
comment: From the people who made the gloriously gorgeous Monument Valley, comes some very standard and lacklustre watch faces. Please take it as a compliment that I expected more from UsTwo.
title: Expected more.

author: Harman Sidhu
comment: Nicest faces ever. I usually don't write reviews but these are gorgeous
title: Amazing

author: Max Larsen
comment: I love the idea of this watchface, but I want the ability to get more detail in the ambient mode
title: Please allow more details in ambient

author: David Mittwede
comment: GREAT FUNCTIONALITY! I wish every watch face you could apply this to! Please make more faces!

author: Hugh Janus
comment: No full colored ambient.

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, [name redacted],

We're actually working on that now. It was a design consideration, initially, to not use color in ambient mode. It created a feeling of a less-active state by not including color.

Thank you for your nuanced critique and understanding.

Best,
ustwo

author: Lim TL
comment: Nice and simple design. I love it!
title: My favourite

author: Sam Triglone
comment: These faces are a masterclass in design. Just genius.
title: Very clever

author: dan Bdan
comment: needs settings and options imo
title: not bad...

author: Captain Wade
comment: This is an awesome watch face and there's finally an integrated timer! As a request, you should see if you can make the Metro 2033 or Metro Last Light watch face with the same integrated timer for us gamers out there :D
title: Finally!

author: Josh Steiner
comment: Watch is nice looking. It only when a timer is going.   Otherwise, meaning most of the day it's quite dull

author: Ray Grau
comment: Would like some more watch faces or color options.
title: Perfect!

author: Gabriel Morell
comment: Having an option to disable the timer if the watch is put to charge would make this perfect.
title: Fantastic except for one tiny thing

author: Kody Scalzi
comment: absolutely love these watch faces. I wish there was at least one digital watch face as I prefer them over analog, but still the best watch faces on the play store.
title: amazing idea

author: Ahmed Jan
comment: I just love to read the change log every update its just awesome PS. Can we have all the change logs because i want to read the old stories too
title: Amazing

comment: Excellent work. Runs lovely on the Galaxy Gear Live.
title: Nice faces with extra features

author: Arik Licholat
comment: And gorgeous too.
title: Perfect for lunch breaks

author: David West
comment: Ustwo are consistently delivering the most useful and aesthetically charming watchfaces for Android Wear. Bravo.
title: Bravo

author: Paul Hall
comment: Di ting is easily readable and irie

author: Andrew D'Amico
comment: Can't set timer

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Andrew!

Would you mind providing some detail about your issue? We'd love to help!

Hit us up on wearissues@ustwo.com for assistance!

Thanks for your time,
ustwo
wearissues@ustwo.com

author: Jim Patteson
comment: I know it's been said before but, these are beautiful......
title: Amazing.......

author: Igor Janković
comment: App is now more useful.

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Igor!

We hear you! We actually just made this possible in the last update! Download the update, set a timer, and then tap on the minute hand of the timer that you set to decrement the timer by one minute per tap.

Hope this helps!

Thank you for your time,
ustwo

title: Great job

author: ahmad ghazi
comment: Very good

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: Useful and beautiful faces with a clever idea.  A warning to Sony Smartwatch 3 owners: the ambient mode uses thin lines that are hard to see.  (This is because ustwo designs their faces to support burn in protection for AMOLED displays.)

author: Ryan Joseph
comment: This watch face is embarrassiny bad. There are no settings to customize anything and the ambient mode is awful, barely usable. How is this rated so highly?

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Ryan!

We just updated the app with the ability to customize colors for Chronos (in watch settings menu), and updated the ambient modes of both faces to be more easily read. Please, download and let us know what you think.

If you find something specifically lacking, please, send us an email at wearissues@ustwo.com.

Thank you,
ustwo

title: No settings, terrible ambient

author: Roozbeh Hormozi
comment: I have a galaxy note 4 android 5.1.1. This app has not any graphic vision. What's wrong with this app? Guide me please

reply.author: ustwo
reply.content:
Hi, Roozbeh!

Would you mind providing some detail about your issue? We'd love to help!

Here's a FAQ we put together to help: http://us2.co/bitswatchfacefaq

Hit us up on wearissues@ustwo.com for further help!

Thanks for your time,
ustwo
wearissues@ustwo.com

author: Anuj Behl
comment: Please provide an option to change the timer interval. I want to set countdowns for as little as 10 sec.
title: Needs more flexibility

author: Giancarlo Delgado
comment: I really like it for Motorola 360 2 gen but can you make it so you can change the color please!😁

author: Cody Franck
comment: I use timers a lot for work and this is the simplest, quickest way to set one. I would really like the option to change colors, but it isn't a deal breaker.
title: Love it!

author: Mohammed Shafi Musthafa Ali
comment: Simply awesome & easy to access the timer. But if it would be great adding some more watch faces
title: Simply elegant

author: Liam Phelps
comment: Love these. You guys make the best faces
